channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Extremely dangerous precedent’ set by Trump’s attack on Venezuela, six countries warn – live
item.description: Spain, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Mexico and Uruguay say US actions ‘constitute an extremely dangerous precedent for peace and regional security’ Top Re...

item.title: Damien Martyn awake from coma in ‘unbelievable’ recovery from meningitis
item.description: Cricket veteran in good spirits and hopeful of moving out of intensive care as recovery continues Get our breaking news email , free app or daily news...

item.title: US ‘running’ Venezuela now seems less likely but second intervention possible
item.description: Washington keeping 15,000-strong military presence in Caribbean in case interim president hinders US objectives US politics live The prospect of the U...

item.title: Anne Frank stepsister and Auschwitz survivor Eva Schloss dies aged 96
item.description: King Charles leads tributes to Holocaust education campaigner, who he met in 2022, saying he and Camilla ‘admired her deeply’ King Charles has paid tr...

item.title: Last 16 victims of Crans-Montana fire identified, police say
item.description: Hundreds of people join silent procession in Swiss town, with youngest known victim just 14-years-old Visual guide: what happened in Crans-Montana? In...

item.title: 'I was sure it was offside' - why did Wirtz equaliser stand?
item.description: Florian Wirtz thought his goal for Liverpool in the 2-2 draw at Fulham was offside - so how did technology allow it to stand?

item.title: Danish PM tells Trump to stop 'threats' against Greenland
item.description: Mette Frederiksen said the "US has no right to annex any of the three nations in the Danish kingdom".

item.title: Auschwitz survivor Eva Schloss dies aged 96 as King leads tributes
item.description: King Charles said he was "privileged and proud" to have known Eva Schloss who died in London on 3 January.

item.title: Snow and ice warnings issued ahead of Monday return to work
item.description: The Met Office warns of disruption to travel as many people return to work and school after Christmas.

item.title: Police identify all 40 victims of Swiss bar fire
item.description: Among those killed by the blaze at Le Constellation is 16-year-old Swiss national Arthur Brodard, his mother confirms.
